Text:
Season's Greetings To All. I Hope You Are All Enjoying Your Christmas Holiday.

A Happy New Year In Advance :)
I have no idea what this is but I will download it and seed it. Just because it's Christmas and to bring joy to others.
@Hyperdrive25- Plz seed!!! Everyone is stuck at 21.5% for hours.

Again a DS game that's an EXE. Verry misleading. Why not a zip or .nds? This could very well be a spy program. Once you click it. It embeds a hidden mini file that allows outside users to connect to your computer. Very scary, but its highly likely.

@krdonnell: My ISP is to blame. I have been having slow internet speed since yesterday.

I will switch to a faster ISP once the holiday season is over.
